name: Flitz LQ 04535 Flitz Liquid Metal Polish-LIQUID METAL POLISH

reviews.name: Flitz International Ltd. LQ04535 Metal Polish Liquid 3.4Oz
reviews.reviewText: Wanted something to remove some bluing from overheated steel. This did that and more. Nice shine and cleaned the blue right off. I would seriously recommend this to anyone who needs to clean up their metal........
reviews.title: Flitzy shiney

reviews.name: Flitz International Ltd. LQ04535 Metal Polish Liquid 3.4Oz
reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for over 10 years. I won't use anything else.
reviews.title: The best for silverware
